route_desc: Operates in Manhattan between Grand Central and Times Square. The shuttle provides a free transfer between 4, 5, 6, and 7 service at Grand Central-42 St and A, C, E, N, Q, R, W, 1, 2, 3, and 7 service at Times Square-42 St. The shuttle runs at all times except during late nights, from about 12 midnight to 6 AM.
